properties.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 14 at 1:23PM AKST until February 15 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Expect wind chills
as cold as 70 below zero.

* WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast, mainly Kaktovik and Barter
Island.

* WHEN...9 PM this evening to noon Saturday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The dangerously cold wind chills will
cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin..
properties.instruction:
A Wind Chill Warning means the combination of very cold air and
sustained wind speeds of 15 mph or more will create dangerously
low wind chill values. Frost bite can occur quickly and even
hypothermia or death if precautions are not taken.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON AKST SATURDAY
